extendedInfo.description: NOTE: NOT COMPATIBLE WITH ANDROID 2.1 AND BELOW."Time Stop 18+ is definitely the best and value-for-money adult casual game!!!" - Akino"Clean, straight-forward time killer game to play with when you are having a smoke or have a minutes to spare..." - MikeThe famous TIME STOP 18+ watch is in your hand. And there's 3 sexy anime girls willing to test it out for you. Tap the stopwatch and the number starts to count. Stop it when the number counts up to the target number and see the magic - clothes begin to disappear !The more they strip, the faster the time counts. Patience and calmly count the timer in your head is the key to win the game. The score is calculated by the number of attempts & the total time used.- All hand drawn graphics by PINSTUDIO- Free version only has 1 girl to play.- Free version has no highscore ranking registered.- Free version has no soundtracks.Keywords: anime girls, sexy anime, time stop 18+, anime strip, cute anime, adult games

reviews.title: Js
reviews.comment: Nice & addicted game! Playing non stop till the girl strips off all. :) 1 of the best high maturity game downloaded.
